name: Zlornko Teaches Typing
description:
Zlornko Teaches Typing is a free point-and-click typing tutor with everyone’s favorite typemaster, Zlornko. Learn how to type the right way with over 18,446,744,000,000,000,000 exciting different configurations of the keyboard, but be careful you don’t flonk the dongoblimpus!

It was made in less than 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41, themed "conflicting genres."
